title: React Counter Component
description: Create a simple React functional component that implements a counter with increment, decrement, and reset buttons. The counter value should be styled red when negative and green when positive using CSS modules.

steps.title: Set up project
steps.description: Create a new React project using create-react-app. Remove unused boilerplate files.

steps.title: Create Counter component
steps.description: Create a new Counter functional component that uses the useState hook to manage the counter value state.

steps.title: Add increment and decrement buttons
steps.description: Add increment and decrement buttons to the Counter component that update the counter value state when clicked.

steps.title: Style Counter with CSS modules
steps.description: Create a CSS module for the Counter component. Style the counter value to be red when negative and green when positive.

steps.title: Add reset button
steps.description: Add a reset button to the Counter component that sets the counter value back to 0 when clicked.

steps.title: Test Counter component
steps.description: Write unit tests for the Counter component to verify the increment, decrement, and reset functionality works properly.

steps.title: Add documentation
steps.description: Write basic documentation explaining how to use the Counter component and add code comments.
